--- title: "Public Opinion and Policy" subtitle: "POLSCI 4SS3 -- Winter 2023 -- McMaster University" --- ## Course Description This course explores quantitative research designs to answer questions about public opinion and policy in academia, government, and industry. We will examine how to conduct surveys to understand variation in public opinion or attitudes toward several subjects across the world. We will also examine empirical strategies to generate credible evidence to inform policy and decision-making in different contexts. In this website you will find all the course materials.
